mapper.insert: insert into dg_print_data (id, print_type, unique_identif, success, content) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{printType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uniqueIdentif,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{success,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into dg_print_data
id,
print_type,
unique_identif,
success,
content,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{printType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{uniqueIdentif,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{success,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update dg_print_data
print_type = #{printType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unique_identif = #{uniqueIdentif,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
success = #{success,jdbcType=INTEGER},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(*) from dg_print_data where success = 0 order by id

select
,
from dg_print_data where success = 0 order by id limit 1

select b.item_file_id,b.item_file_number,a.unit,b.item_final_price,b.is_tc as isTc, a.name as name,a.num as num, b.subtotal,a.ppdl_id as ppdl_id,a.ppxl_id as ppxl_id from dg_item_file a left join dg_ow_consumer_details b on a.id = b.item_file_id left join dg_item_file_type c on a.ppdl_id = c.id left join dg_item_file_type d on a.ppxl_id = d.id where b.ow_id = #{owId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select c.name as seatName,date_format(b.service_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as time,a.ow_num as owNum,d.name as consumerName, d.id as consumerId, b.service_num as serviceNum, b.service_type as serviceType, concat(su.emp_code,'-',su.emp_name) as empName,ifnull(b.zdbz,'æ— ') as zdbz from dg_open_water a left join dg_ow_service_form b on a.id = b.ow_id left join dg_consumer_seat c on a.seat_id = c.id left join dg_consumption_area d on c.cons_area = d.id left join sys_user su on b.waiter_id = su.id where b.id = #{owId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select d.id as consumerId from dg_open_water a left join dg_consumer_seat c on a.seat_id = c.id left join dg_consumption_area d on c.cons_area = d.id where a.id = #{owId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select b.item_file_id,b.item_file_number,a.unit,b.item_final_price, a.name as name,a.num as num,b.reminder_number,b.ow_id, b.subtotal,a.ppdl_id as ppdl_id,a.ppxl_id as ppxl_id from dg_item_file a left join dg_ow_consumer_details b on a.id = b.item_file_id left join dg_item_file_type c on a.ppdl_id = c.id left join dg_item_file_type d on a.ppxl_id = d.id where
(b.ow_id = #{item.serviceId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and b.item_file_id = #{item.itemFileId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

select a.ow_num,b.name,date_format(a.first_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as first_time,a.people_count from dg_open_water a left join dg_consumer_seat b on a.seat_id = b.id where a.id = #{owId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select a.ow_num,b.name as seat_name,b.number as seat_code from dg_open_water a left join dg_consumer_seat b on a.seat_id = b.id where a.team_members = #{member,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.id != #{owId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
